title: Commending Bishop Joseph Mattera upon the occasion of his 30 year Anniversary to be celebrated on January 29, 2011
fulltext:
LEGISLATIVE  RESOLUTION  commending Bishop Joseph Mattera upon the occa-
sion of his 30 year Anniversary to be celebrated on January 29, 2011

WHEREAS, The character and richness of religious and community  life  in
this  noble Empire State is nourished and fulfilled through the faithful
concern and selfless devotion of those who would commit  their  energies
and purpose to the ministry of others; and
  WHEREAS, It is the sense of this Legislative Body to bring full recog-
nition  and just tribute to those individuals who distinguish themselves
and the ministry through their unremitting commitment and preeminence of
service; and
  WHEREAS, This Legislative Body  is  justly  proud  to  commend  Bishop
Joseph  Mattera upon the occasion of his 30 year Anniversary to be cele-
brated on Saturday, January 29, 2011; and
  WHEREAS, In full-time ministry since 1980, Bishop Mattera, is current-
ly the Presiding Bishop of  Christ  Covenant  Coalition  and  Overseeing
Bishop of Resurrection Church in New York, a multiethnic congregation of
40  nationalities  that  has successfully developed numerous leaders and
holistic ministry in the New York region and beyond; and
  WHEREAS, Bishop Mattera has ministered  extensively,  both  nationally
and internationally, reaching out to many nations across the globe; and
  WHEREAS,  A  Doctor  of  Ministry, Bishop Mattera earned his degree in
Biblical Worldview from Bakke Graduate University; he is the  author  of
three   theological   books   entitled  RULING  IN  THE  GATES,  KINGDOM
REVOLUTION, and KINGDOM AWAKENING; and
  WHEREAS, Bishop Mattera has  appeared  on  nationally-known  Christian
networks  such  as  Trinity  Broadcasting  Network,  Daystar  Television
Network, and Cornerstone Television Network;  he  has  written  numerous
original  articles  and  position  papers, as well as presented multiple
seminars and sermons; and
  WHEREAS, With him throughout have been his loving wife, and their five
adoring children, all of whom feel privileged to be part of his life and
rejoice in his achievements; and
  WHEREAS, Bishop Mattera has brought to his  ministry  an  overwhelming
spirit  of  charity and compassion, acting from vision and enlightenment
in conducting his administrative  and  spiritual  duties,  while  always
displaying  the highest standards of personal and professional integrity
and dedication; and
  WHEREAS, This distinguished man of God has always given enlightenment,
guidance and wisdom to the many entrusted to his care and  has  adminis-
tered abundantly and unstintingly to the spiritual and corporal needs of
all; and
  WHEREAS,  It  is the sense of this Legislative Body that when a person
of such noble aims and accomplishments is brought to our attention it is
appropriate to publicly and jubilantly proclaim and commend  that  indi-
vidual for the edification of others; now, therefore, be it
  RESOLVED,  That  this  Legislative  Body pause in its deliberations to
commend Bishop Joseph Mattera upon the occasion of his 30 year  Anniver-
sary,  noting  his unremitting and compassionate faith and his exemplary
service to God, man, and his community, and extending to him the  heart-
felt  best  wishes  of  this Legislative Body for a future of purposeful
success and well-being; and be it further
  RESOLVED, That a copy of this Resolution, suitably engrossed, be tran-
smitted to Bishop Joseph Mattera.
